prompts: Create a colorful fish Pokemon with vibrant patterns and a playful demeanor.
I want a water-type Pokemon that looks like a tropical fish with unique colors.
Generate an aquatic creature with a bold design and a fierce expression.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a hybrid between a fish and a beautiful coral reef.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in the ocean with bright colors and distinctive features.
Design a whimsical fish Pokemon that captures the essence of a tropical paradise.
Give me an eccentric fish Pokemon that stands out with its playful personality.
